name: Coquiman
description:
Source code by PMProg - available here.

Art, animation, and music by Nikku4211.

This submission to GBA Winter Jam 2023 was originally supposed to be more than just a title screen. It was supposed to be a game where Coquiman climbs on buildings and attacks enemies using his fists and grabbing things with his tongue.

Unfortunately, we ran out of time, so only a title screen was made.
